title: Ticket #3012: Schedd aborts if spool directory is not writable
description:
The schedd aborts with the log below if you set the spool directory to something unwritable.

This appears to have been introduced in 5a106f5d by Dan.

Certainly a rare case, but it should exit with an error instead of an abort.

Looks like the same thing happens if the daemon cannot open its log file.
